content.question: In lines 2-3, qui imperfectus adhuc omissus est is translated

choices.label: who, neglected, left it still unfinished
which will always be unfinished and neglected
which, still unfinished, has been neglected

content.answer: which, still unfinished, has been neglected

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
